page.title: 17PAPER DISTRIBUTION AT KYM6
page.content: {KYM6 Papers.}This is a service company which converts paper belonging to the two companies which own it. These are; {a)M6 Papers Ltd.}an English company in the paper selling business mostly with publishers of books, magazines etc.{b)Kymenne}is the industrial concern dealing with all Finnish busines throughout the world and the share in KYM6 is Kymenne Paper UK Ltd. whose offices are in St.James Square,London. Hence the Name KYM6. KYM6 are engaged in converting reels of paper into sheets or into smaller reels. A large proportion of the heavy vehicles delivering to Macclesfield is going to KYM6. The finished paper is either packed into parcels of a ream (500 sheets) or bulk packed onto pallets. Paper is then delivered direct. Waste which arises is sold for re-processing.
